thread.title: BREAKING: Techiman City joins Dreams FC and Dwarfs for Premier League
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Techiman City joins Dreams FC and Dwarfs for Premier League

title: BREAKING: Techiman City joins Dreams FC and Dwarfs for Premier League
text:
Sports News | 30 September 2015 21:55 CET BREAKING: Techiman City joins Dreams FC and Dwarfs for Premier League - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Techiman City despite their recent setbacks with bribery allegations levelled against them and Wa African United gathered pieces together to amassed 60 points ahead of second-placed Real Tamale United(RTU) and and Berekum Arsenals. 
City placed a Stay-off execution on the ruling of GFAâ€™s Disciplinary Committee verdict after being demoted to the third-tier league and depending on the outcome of the Appeals Committee sitting. 
The Techiman-based club, formally known as BA Stars will replace relegated BA United as the next Brong Ahafo club to taste premiership next season. 
They will join Bechem United, Aduana Stars and Berekum Chelsea for the 2015-16 campaign. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
